title: Start
body:
<<triggerSound EnvironmentSoundFX doorKnock>>
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>One sec!
<<changeFont Brynn internalMonologue>><<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>Just gotta put this here and…
<<triggerSound EnvironmentSoundFX placeDMScreen>>
<<changeFont Brynn internalMonologue>><<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>There!
<<changeFont Brynn outOfCharacter>><<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>It’s open!
<<triggerSound EnvironmentSoundFX doorOpenClose>>
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>>Brynn!
<<showCharacter Ruby true>>
<<overridePose Ruby plusTwo>> Oh my God, it’s so good to you! It’s been ages!
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>><<overridePose Brynn plusOne>>I know, it’s great to see you too!
<<triggerSound EnvironmentSoundFX sitDownTimesTwo>><<characterAppears Ruby true>><<characterAppears Brynn true>>
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>><<overridePose Ruby plusOne>>When did you get back?
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>About three days ago, jet lag and all.
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>>You should’ve told me you were coming! I would’ve picked you up from the airport, you know?
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>Yeah, I know, but I wanted to surprise you guys.
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>>But I would’ve made a sign!
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>No worries, Ruby. I’m just glad to be back.
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>>So, how was it? How was London?
<<freezeDialogueText Ruby>>
[[It was cool!|ItWasCool]]
[[I missed home.|IMissedHome]]

title: ItWasCool
body:
<<unfreezeDialogueText Ruby>>
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>I loved it!
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>I’ve always wanted to go to England so finally being there was incredible!
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>You know George Orwell, right?
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>><<overridePose Ruby zero>>Umm… that’s the author of 1984 right?
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>Yup, and a lot of other books. He spent a lot of time in London.
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>One of my classes was just about reading and breaking down his works.
<<overridePose Ruby plusOne>>Wow, that’s really cool! You must’ve loved it.
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>I did! And I know it’s cliché to say, but Big Ben is actually pretty cool.
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>>Knowing you, you must’ve taken an albums’ worth of pictures. I want to see them sometime!
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>>Anyway, I’m really glad you had a great time. 
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>>And now you can channel your new story skills into being Dungeon Master!
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>><<overridePose Ruby zero>><<overridePose Brynn zero>>: We haven’t played any D&D since you left. We were talking about playing a few one-shots while we waited for you to come back, but, uh…
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>><<overridePose Ruby minusOne>>...We, um... we forgot to really talk about it, I guess.
[[Rebranch1]]

title: IMissedHome
body:
<<unfreezeDialogueText Ruby>>
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>It was nice! Still I’m glad to be back.
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>The literature courses I took were great and the sightseeing was a lot of fun, but I missed not having to carry an umbrella with me every day.
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>>Yeah, I heard it rains a lot.
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>No kidding! And there’s a lot of meat pie. I must’ve had meat pie three times a week.
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>>Really?
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>Really! But seriously, I missed you all. And I missed this.
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>>We missed you too!
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>><<overridePose Ruby minusOne>><<overridePose Brynn zero>>I mean, I’m sure everyone did. It’s been a little while since we talked.
[[Rebranch1]]

title: Rebranch1
body:
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>><<overridePose Ruby zero>>Anyway, uh, I’m glad we can get back to the old campaign!
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>><<overridePose Brynn zero>>Yeah, me too!
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>Sorry I had to leave when you guys were right at a cliffhanger. 
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>I can’t wait to see how the campaign wraps up after all these years.
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>>It’s okay! And I’m excited too.
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>>So… everyone’s coming, right?
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>Yeah, they should be.
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>>Like, both Lance and Allison? 
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>>And even Franklin?
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>Yeah, I’m pretty sure.
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>>Okay, uh, good! That’s good.
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>>It’ll be nice to finally catch up with everyone.
[[What have you been up to?|WhatHaveYouBeenUpTo]]
[[Is everything okay?|IsEverythingOkay]]

title: WhatHaveYouBeenUpTo
body:
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>For sure! Speaking of, how have you been?
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>>Oh! Yeah, pretty good, pretty good!
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>Still doing forensic science and everything?
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>>Yeah, for sure. It’s going pretty well!
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>>The assignments have gotten harder, but I think I can handle it.
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>>I just wish I could find a study group. [Insert relevant class here] is kind of kicking my ass.
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>I’m sure everyone in your class feels that way.
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>>Yeah, maybe.
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>>It was just... nice, back in high school when we could always go to each other for help.
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>>Franklin helped me get through history, and I’m pretty sure you saved my AP English grade!
<<overridePose Brynn plusOne>><<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>It’s what we’re here for.
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>>Yeah…
<<overridePose Ruby minusOne>><<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>>...Yeah.
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>>…
[[Is everything okay?|IsEverythingOkay]]

title: IsEverythingOkay
body:
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>Hey… what’s wrong?
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>><<overridePose Ruby minusOne>>Well… there’s…
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>>Since you left, things have been…
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>>...a little weird.
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>>With us. The group, I mean.
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>Is everyone okay?
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>>I don’t know.
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>>I’ve barely heard from Franklin in months, and as for Lance and Allison, I think something went really wrong with them.
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>>Brynn, I think I... I think we really need your help. I think we’ll fall apart unless you can keep us together.
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>Do you want me to talk everyone?
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>>I don’t know, I don’t think anyone wants to talk about what’s going on with them. It’s not like it used to be.
<<overridePose Ruby zero>><<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>>But I was just thinking, we’ve had arguments before when we were playing the D&D, and you helped us through those.
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>But that was in the game, I’m not sure what I can do otherwise.
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>Ruby, what exactly happened to everyone?
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>>Well, I heard that Allison and Lance—
<<triggerSound EnvironmentSoundFX doorKnock>>
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>>Oh!
<<activateSpeechBubble Lance>>“Honey, I’m ho-ome!”
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>It’s open, Lance!
<<activateSpeechBubble Lance>>Yeah, I figured.
<<showCharacter Lance true>>
<<triggerSound EnvironmentSoundFX doorOpenClose>><<triggerSound EnvironmentSoundFX sitDown>><<characterAppears Lance true>>
<<activateSpeechBubble Lance>>Well, don’t everyone get up to offer me a seat all at once.
<<activateSpeechBubble Lance>>I’m not interrupting anything, am I?
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>>No! We were just catching up.
<<activateSpeechBubble Lance>>Good, because I’ve been dying to get back to the campaign. 
<<activateSpeechBubble Lance>>And I’m not holding back on any of my skill checks just because y’all are a little rusty.
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>Good to see you too, Mr. Rogue.
<<activateSpeechBubble Lance>>Good to be seen! Also, welcome back stateside, Brynn.
<<activateSpeechBubble Lance>>Ruby, you okay? You seem a little off.
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>>Oh! No, yeah, I’m fine. I’m glad you’re here, Lance!
<<activateSpeechBubble Lance>>Yeah, what would anyone do without me?
<<activateSpeechBubble Lance>>After all…
<<activateSpeechBubble Lance>><<changeFont Lance inCharacter>>Arannis Shadowfall’s aim is only ever untrue when he wills it.<<changeFont Lance outOfCharacter>>
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>>I’ve missed those voices of yours, Lance!
<<activateSpeechBubble Lance>>Yeah, not bad, right?
[[Not bad at all.|NotBadAtAll]]
[[Eh...|Eh]]

title: NotBadAtAll
body:
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>You haven’t lost your touch.
<<returnToDefaultPose Lance>><<increaseValue Lance>>
<<activateSpeechBubble Lance>>Why, thank you.
<<activateSpeechBubble Lance>>It always makes me happy to have an appreciative audience.
<<decreaseValue Lance>>

title: Eh
body:
<<overridePose Brynn plusOne>><<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>Keep practicing, theatre boy.
<<returnToDefaultPose Lance>><<decreaseValue Lance>>
<<activateSpeechBubble Lance>>Oof. Tough crowd.
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>>It’s okay, Lance, she was just teasing.
<<increaseValue Lance>>
<<activateSpeechBubble Lance>>Yeah, I know. Now, if that had been some real slander, Brynn, I might’ve just had to kill you.
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>Sure, sure.<<returnToDefaultPose Brynn>>
